help_description:
Find hidden words in the grid by dragging across the letters.

Use the hints below the puzzle to guess each hidden word.
Example: "Report scams to the ___" â†’ Answer: POLICE.

Words can be placed:
- Horizontally (left to right)
- Vertically (top to bottom)
- Diagonally (Hard mode only)

Choose a difficulty level:
- Normal: Horizontal and vertical words only
- Hard: Includes diagonal words too

The timer tracks your progress.
